question: My 25 year old daughter was diagnosed first  type 2 and then type 1 after doing GAD 65. She has other problems  - hashimotos and polycystic ovary disease. She has gained over 25 lbs on insulin and is very depressed about it. Is there any help for her to get her weight under control, She works out daily and eats properly.
title: type 1 diabetes
